Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Value: Read all ADC Voltages from Channels as single block, starting from base address 0x18 (dec 24) (reads 2 bytes * 8 channels = 16 bytes)

Channel.Name: Channel1
Channel.Description: Raw data has 2 bytes per channel, use unsigned short as type

Operator.Name: MovingAverage
Operator.Description: Remove noise from the resulting value
